title: Kernel Season's Drizzle Brittle, Variety Pack, 13.1 oz, Pack of 2
features: Variety pack includes: 1 Caramel and 1 Chocolate flavor
Create your own candy-coated treat by adding to popcorn
Chocolate popcorn topping with ribbons of smooth decadent chocolate
Caramel popcorn topping is rich and velvety, the next level of caramel corn
Poor just the right amount to satisfy your sweet tooth
description: At Kernel Season's, we are committed to shaking up America's popcorn flavors. We do it by creating delicious seasonings that bring your popcorn- and other foods-to life. Using all natural ingredients like aged cheese, no MSG and zero grams of fat, you can shake on the flavor without the guilt. So join the flavor revolution and find a taste that's truly yours with our White Cheddar, Ranch, Cheesy Jalapeno, Nacho Cheddar, Kettle Corn, Garlic Parmesan, Butter, Buffalo Wing, Milk Chocolate Caramel, Popcorn Salt, Bacon Cheddar and Caramel seasonings. Now in a new package that really pops! To quote Kernel Season, "A wise man will tell you to shake up your flavor. That wise man is me".
